bishwas.gcdc.stripchartrecorder.graph

Class GraphAssistant

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • bishwas.gcdc.stripchartrecorder.graph.GraphAssistant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class GraphAssistant
extends java.lang.Thread
implements java.io.Serializable
    Instantiates and handles the line graph view, receives data and plots on the line graph view. Also takes care of graph control handles such as zoom in, zoom out, reset etc.
    Author:
    Bishwas Gautam Copyright (C) 2011 Gulf Coast Data Concepts Licensed under the GNU Lesser General Public License (LGPL) http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl.html
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
